title: Liver, onions and bacon
ingredients: ['drizzle of vegetable oil', '2 large onions, sliced', '6 rashers unsmoked streaky bacon', "500g lamb's liver, sliced", '1 tablespoon plain flour', 'boiled water, to cover', '2 beef stock cubes', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch black pepper', 'salt to taste']
